issue.title: [CF 963] combat lockdown violation
issue.body:
Date: 2014-07-07 01:00:28
ID: -1
Error occured in: AddOn: TellMeWhen
Count: 4
Message: Note: AddOn TellMeWhen attempted to call a protected function (OverrideActionBarButton4:Show()) during combat lockdown.
Debug:
   [C]: Show()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:268: ActionButton_Update()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:523: ActionButton_OnEvent()
   ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:124:
      ..\FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:117
Locals:
None

TmW version  v7.0.2 r3 (g27f6bdf)
this error keeps repeating


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #963 | Raw
